Definition: The tweet will be classified into one of three categories: (1) 'Hate Speech', (2) 'Offensive', or (3) 'Neither'. 'Hate Speech' is a threatening statement or sometimes includes a call for violence, while 'offensive' statements are simply offensive. 'Neither' is when it doesn't fall into the 'Hate Speech' or 'Offensive' category.
